import math

import sys

def main():
    N = int(sys.stdin.readline().rstrip())
    A = [int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split()]
    dp = [0] * N
    dp[0] = A[0]
    dp[1] = A[1]
    for i in range(2, N):
        dp[i] = max(dp[i - 1], dp[i - 2]) + A[i]
    print(dp[N - 1])

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()


def main():
    n = int(input())
    candies = [int(x) for x in input().split()]

    dp = [0] * (n + 1)

    dp[1] = candies[0]
    for j in range(2, n + 1):
        dp[j] = max(dp[j - 1], dp[j - 2] + candies[j - 1])

    print(dp[n])

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    b = [int(x) for x in input().split()]

    dp = [[0] * (n+1) for _ in range(2)]

    dp[0][1] = a[0]
    dp[1][1] = b[0]
    for j in range(2, n+1):
        dp[0][j] = max(dp[0][j-1], dp[1][j-1]) + a[j-1]
        dp[1][j] = max(dp[0][j-1], dp[1][j-1]) + b[j-1]

    print(max(dp[0][n], dp[1][n]))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = [int(x) for x in input().split()]


    dp = [0] * n
    dp[0] = a[0]
    for i in range(1, n):
        dp[i] = a[i]
        for j in range(i):
            if a[j] < a[i]:
                dp[i] = max(dp[i], dp[j] + a[i])

    print(max(dp))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


import sys

def main():
    N = int(sys.stdin.readline().rstrip())
    A = [[int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split()] for _ in range(2)]
    dp = [[0] * N for _ in range(2)]
    dp[0][0] = A[0][0] + A[1][0]
    dp[1][0] = A[0][0] + A[1][0]
    for i in range(1, N):
        dp[0][i] = max(dp[0][i - 1], dp[1][i - 1]) + A[0][i]
        dp[1][i] = dp[0][i - 1] + A[1][i]
    print(max(dp[0][N - 1], dp[1][N - 1]))

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

import sys

def main():
    N = int(sys.stdin.readline().rstrip())
    A = [[int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split()] for _ in range(3)]
    dp = [[0] * N for _ in range(3)]
    dp[0][0] = A[0][0]
    dp[1][0] = A[1][0]
    for i in range(1, N):
        dp[0][i] = max(dp[0][i - 1], dp[1][i - 1]) + A[0][i]
        dp[1][i] = max(dp[0][i - 1], dp[1][i - 1]) + A[1][i]
    print(max(dp[0][N - 1], dp[1][N - 1]))

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
